5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that when ‘Abdullah bin ‘Umar had prayed Friday, he went and prayed two Rak’ah in his house. Then he said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to do that.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer after Friday
